Reviews.Title: good replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Sandra Manuel
Reviews.Content: i just got it today and still adjusting to it. i dropped my iphone and cracked face so i had to get a replacement asap. read the reviews on it and thought i'd give it a try. i don't exactly "love" the iphone. this is a good replacement phone for now.
